title: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to...

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Am I going to get placed in low priority Que for this? I'm connected to the internet and I've retried many times wtf.

replies.body: There might be something unexpectedly blocking your access if you know your network is still up and running. I'd start by temporarily disabling firewalls/antivirus, but it'd also be a good step to check out your DNS settings following those steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). That can help you get a clearer path to our servers and should be able to help all-around.
